description: Weathertight doors for NGCC Des Groseilliers including fabrication and delivery
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Details

*   **Title**: F3065-220238 – CCGS Des Groseilliers Weathertight Doors
*   **Reference Number**: WS3675919231-Doc3684810231
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3675919231
*   **Publication Date**: October 18, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 16, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: December 2, 2023
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

### Business Requirements

*   **UNSPSC Code**: 25111900 – Marine Craft Systems and Subassemblies
*   **Description**: The solicitation is for the acquisition of weathertight doors for the (NGCC) Des Groseilliers, including fabrication and delivery
*   **Trade Agreements**: This solicitation is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contracting Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entity Name**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
*   **End User Entity Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada

### Address Contact

*   **Contact Name**: Joanne Godin2, SPAC/PSPC
*   **Contact Email**: <joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
